data: Let's start by selecting our MINER. Simply LEFT CLICK or TAP on units to select them.
Move that MINER next to those minerals. LEFT Click or TAP on one of the blinking squares to move a unit. RIGHT CLICK or TAP with TWO fingers to undo.

These new buttons are the Action Menu. This menu changes depending on the tiles you are next to or how many resources you have to use. Select the button labeled GATHER then LEFT CLICK or TAP on the space labeled GATHER.

Check the top of the screen. You now have some money to spend! But our units can only move once and perform one action per turn, that is all we can do for now. Hit the End Turn button in the top right.

Miners can build any unit as long as there is enough money available. Other units can make copies of themselves. Select the MINER like before, then LEFT CLICK or TAP it again to remain in that same space.
Now select BUILD and select the SCOUT. Choose a location to build the SCOUT then end your turn to continue.

Go ahead and play around some more with other unts to see how they work. Use them to find and finish off the enemy. You can see the stats of all the units in the OPTIONS menu. Use the dropdown menu in the top right.
